Discontinued Products

We're sorry to say that we've had to disconinue sales of all our Mac and Windows products. This includes iGadget, iRepo and Tunejack.

Due to most people now streaming music and easy backups of their music collection with iCloud and such, sales of our Mac and Windows products dropped so low that it was costing us more in service fees than we were generating in sales.

We had a great time helping out fellow iPod, iPhone and iPad music enthusiasts.

Sincerely,
Purple Ghost Software

Discontinued Version Downloads

Here are download links for some older versions of our now discontinued products. These are provided here in case you need to download a product you purchased in the past.

Note: These have not been updated for quite some time and there is no guarantee that these products will work any longer. It is highly unlikely that they will work correctly or at all on newer versions of Windows or MacOS.

License Keys

Since these have been discontinued for quite some time, I have decided to publish these free license keys anyone may use to register the latest version of each application.

  • iGadget v7.9 - CJHRT-BGQXB-8A3FB-EABC6
  • iGadget X v4.3.1 - HDA6X-DQ3VJ-BB984-638B6

  • iRepo X v5.1 - LQ3PU-9BCJG-368A9-C7EB7
